mapper.insert: insert into tbl_base_station (id, station_real_id, station_name, token, auction_name, sys_user, phone, enable, remarks,create_person,create_time,del_flag) values (#{id}, #{stationRealId}, #{stationName}, #{token}, #{auctionName}, #{sysUser}, #{phone}, #{enable}, #{remarks}, #{createPerson}, #{createTime}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update tbl_base_station
station_real_id = #{stationRealId},
station_name = #{stationName},
token = #{token},
auction_name = #{auctionName},
sys_user = #{sysUser},
phone = #{phone},
enable = #{enable},
remarks = #{remarks},
modify_person = #{modifyPerson},
modify_time = #{modifyTime},
where id = #{id}
